msg: This commit was manufactured by cvs2svn to create tag

author: wrowe
msg: As reported by Jeff Trawick, winsock errors simply don't run through
FormatMessage on all Win32 platforms.  This patch addresses the problem,
and leaves room for other obsure errors to be added.  Obviously, the
apr_os_strerror doesn't belong in a single source file, but I'm not
fixing that before the a8 release.

author: wrowe
msg: Take care of some newer Win32 SDK symbols

author: trawick
msg: Restore some AF_INET logic which shouldn't be dependent on IPv6 support.
